mapper.select: SELECT U.UserId, U.UserName, U.FullName, R.RoleId, USM.StoreId FROM tblUser U JOIN tblStatus STT ON U.StatusId != 2 AND STT.StatusId = U.StatusId JOIN tblRole R ON R.RoleId = U.RoleId LEFT JOIN tblUserStoreMapping USM ON USM.UserId = U.UserId AND USM.StatusId = 1 LEFT JOIN tblStore ST ON USM.StoreId = ST.StoreId WHERE U.UserName = BINARY #{username}

SELECT U.UserId, U.UserName, U.FullName, U.ImageURL ,STT.StatusId, STT.StatusName, R.RoleId, R.RoleName, USM.StoreId, ST.StoreName FROM tblUser U JOIN tblStatus STT ON U.StatusId != 2 AND STT.StatusId = U.StatusId JOIN tblRole R ON R.RoleId = U.RoleId LEFT JOIN tblUserStoreMapping USM ON USM.UserId = U.UserId AND USM.StatusId = 1 LEFT JOIN tblStore ST ON USM.StoreId = ST.StoreId WHERE U.UserName = BINARY #{username} AND U.Password = BINARY #{password}
